casebody.data:
CITY OF MUNCIE UNSAFE BUILDING HEARING AUTHORITY, James Lee, Doug Marshall, Deborah Malitz, Aaron Wood, and Brad King, in their official capacities, Appellants-Defendants,
v.
Popatlal PATEL, Appellee-Plaintiff. Court of Appeals Case No. 18A02-1707-PL-1729 Court of Appeals of Indiana. April 25, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

SHEPARD , Sr.J. Reversed and remanded with instructions. NAJAM, J., Concurs.

MAY, J., Concurs.
